body.p:
To His Excellency
Beriah Magoffin Govr

Your Petition Elijah Halsey would respectfully request the remission of a fine of fifteen dollars imposed on him by Garrold Wates Justice of the peace in Athens Fayette County for a breach of the peace in said town, He states that the difficulty was between himself & Sidney Christian there was no weapons of any used, & no damage done he is unable to pay the fine & pray your Excellency to interfere in his behalf & remit it,
The undersigned citizen of Athens & the vicinity unite in the prayer of the above petition.

Milton Hendson
Geo W Laying
F G Anthony --
M. L. Awbrey
Geog. M. Stipp
S. L. Barkley
E Y Stivers
J. C Rogers
R C Rogers

Haley Pet
Remitted
B. M
Issued Apl 28"
